critique: This document is an executive order that exempts Burt W. Andrews from compulsory retirement for age for one year. It is a very specific action pertaining to one individual. It is difficult to assess broad political biases based on this document alone. Most of the axes are not applicable. The only axis that might be relevant is executive power, as the order utilizes the authority vested in the president by law. However, it's a fairly routine action and doesn't represent a significant expansion of executive power.
